messages.message: Invalid KTXswizzle value. The size of the value must be 5 bytes (including the NULL terminator).
messages.details: The size of KTXswizzle value is 4 byte(s) but it must be 5 bytes (including the NULL terminator).

messages.message: Non-conformant texture file accepted by libktx.
messages.details: KTX 2.0 file does not conform to the specification but it is currently accepted by libktx.
